name: RagooP!
description:
RagooP! is a game made for Ludum Dare #39 (Theme: Running out of Power).

RUN away! Get OUT OF the POWER!
If you stop, power will consume you.

Can you deal with so much power, or your power will destroy you?

NOTE: Executables (.exe) generated by Game Maker: Studio may arbitrarily run at ~3/4 × correct fps on your computer. This is less probable in the fixed version ("RagooP!.exe (fixed)" file).
